titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 394) making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 1988, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-419.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 11/4/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.J. Res. 394 (continuing appropriations).
